Package nj

Class NJAlgorithm

  • java.lang.Object
    • nj.NJAlgorithm

  • public class NJAlgorithm
extends java.lang.Object
    Java implementation of the NJ algorithm that uses PAL library. Previously I used (but It was too slow): (http://www.itu.dk/people/sestoft/bsa.html and http://www.itu.dk/~sestoft/bsa/Match7.java implementations)
